abstract: William Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management is betting against the debt of BP through credit-default swaps, saying the energy company’s creditworthiness will be dented for years after its notorious oil spill.
snippet: William Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management is betting against the debt of BP through credit-default swaps, saying the energy company’s creditworthiness will be dented for years after its notorious oil spill.
lead_paragraph: William Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management is betting against the debt of BP through credit-default swaps, saying the energy company’s creditworthiness will be dented for years by the biggest offshore oil spill in United States history.

headline.main: Pershing Square Betting Against BP’s Debt
